p: This divide appears even more expansive in the context of the climate crisis and clean energy transition. Young women and men are demanding actions to secure their future. They are well aware of the ‘code red for humanity’,2 and that immediate action needs to be taken to avert a catastrophe. Naturally, there is much more at stake for them than for those over 50. Their seriousness stands in stark contrast with the ‘dangerous lack of urgency’3 displayed by those representing them.
